name: A Ritual: In Far Too Many Words
name_original: A Ritual: In Far Too Many Words
description:
Choose your beginning and see how the story for that character unfolds based on your choices.  Then, play again from a different point of view, and see how the story looks from that character's point of view.  Will your story end early or keep going?

Made for the Global Game Jam 2016 - Theme "Ritual"
